mapper.update: update user set sign = #{sign}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, avatar = #{avatar} where userAccount = #{userAccount};
update user set password = #{password} where userAccount = #{userAccount};
mapper.insert: insert into user (userName, userAccount, password, roleId, salt, gender, sign) values (#{userName}, #{userAccount}, #{password}, #{roleId}, #{salt}, #{gender}, #{sign});
mapper.select: select roleName from user u, role r where u.userAccount = #{userAccount} and u.roleId = r.roleId;
select u.userAccount, u.userName, u.salt, u.email, r.roleName from user u inner join role r on u.roleId = r.roleId;
select u.userId, u.userAccount, u.userName, u.sign, r.roleName, u.salt, u.avatar, u.gender, u.email from user u inner join role r on u.roleId = r.roleId where userAccount = #{userAccount};
